pkgmetadata.longdescription: Generalised Additive Point Process Models // Methods for fitting point processes with parameters of generalised additive model (GAM) form are provided. For an introduction to point processes see Cox, D.R Isham, V. (Point Processes, 1980, CRC Press), GAMs see Wood, S.N. (2017) doi:10.1201/9781315370279, and the fitting approach see Wood, S.N., Pya, N. Safken, B. (2016) doi:10.1080/01621459.2016.1180986.
